data.sentence: Eran las diez de la noche, piloteaba mi nave.
data.translation: It was ten o'clock at night, I was piloting my ship.
data.literalTranslation: It was the ten of the night, I was piloting my ship.

data.sentence: Era mi taxi un Volkswagen del año 68.
data.translation: My taxi was a Volkswagen from the year 1968.
data.literalTranslation: Was my taxi a Volkswagen of the year 68.

data.sentence: Era un día de esos malos, donde no hubo pasaje.
data.translation: It was one of those bad days, where there was no passage.
data.literalTranslation: It was a day of those bad, where not there was passage.

data.sentence: Las lentejuelas de un traje me hicieron la parada.
data.translation: The sequins of a suit made me stop.
data.literalTranslation: The sequins of a suit to me made the stop.

data.sentence: Era una rubia preciosa, llevaba minifalda.
data.translation: She was a gorgeous blonde, she was wearing a miniskirt.
data.literalTranslation: She was a blonde gorgeous, she was wearing miniskirt.

data.sentence: El escote en su espalda llegaba justo a la gloria.
data.translation: The neckline on her back reached right to the glory.
data.literalTranslation: The neckline on her back arrived right to the glory.

data.sentence: Una lágrima negra rodaba en su mejilla.
data.translation: A black tear rolled down her cheek.
data.literalTranslation: A tear black rolled on her cheek.

data.sentence: Mientras que el retrovisor decía: ¡Ve qué pantorrillas!
data.translation: While the rearview mirror said: See what calves!
data.literalTranslation: While that the rearview mirror said: See what calves!

data.sentence: Yo vi un poco más.
data.translation: I saw a little more.
data.literalTranslation: I saw a little more.

data.sentence: Eran las diez con cuarenta, zigzagueava en reforma.
data.translation: It was ten forty, I was zigzagging in Reforma.
data.literalTranslation: It was the ten with forty, I was zigzagging in Reforma.

data.sentence: Me dijo: Me llamo Norma, mientras cruzaba la pierna.
data.translation: She told me: My name is Norma, while I crossed my leg.
data.literalTranslation: To me said: To me call Norma, while crossed the leg.

data.sentence: Sacó un cigarro, algo extraño, de esos que te dan risa.
data.translation: He took out a cigarette, something strange, of those that make you laugh.
data.literalTranslation: Took out a cigarette, something strange, of those that to you give laughter.

data.sentence: Le ofrecí fuego de prisa y me temblaba la mano.
data.translation: I offered him fire quickly and my hand was shaking.
data.literalTranslation: To him offered fire of hurry and to me trembled the hand.

data.sentence: Le pregunté por quién llora y me dijo: Por un tipo que se cree que por rico, puede venir a engañarme.
data.translation: I asked him for whom she cries and he said to me: For a guy that believes that because of being rich, he can come to deceive me.
data.literalTranslation: To him asked for who cries and to me said: For a guy that himself believes that for rich, can come to deceive me.

data.sentence: No caiga usted por amores, debe de levantarse (le dije).
data.translation: Don't fall for love, you must get up (I said).
data.literalTranslation: No fall you for loves, must of get up (to him said).

data.sentence: ¿Qué es lo que hace un taxista con sus sueños de cama?
data.translation: What does a taxi driver do with his bed dreams?
data.literalTranslation: What is what does a taxi driver with his dreams of bed?

data.sentence: Me pregunté.
data.translation: I wondered.
data.literalTranslation: Myself I asked.

data.sentence: Lo vi abrazando y besando a una humilde muchacha.
data.translation: I saw him hugging and kissing a humble girl.
data.literalTranslation: Him I saw hugging and kissing to a humble girl.

data.sentence: Es de clase muy sencilla, lo sé por su facha.
data.translation: She's from a very simple class, I know it by her appearance.
data.literalTranslation: She is of class very simple, it I know by her appearance.

data.sentence: Me sonreía en el espejo y se sentaba de lado.
data.translation: She smiled at me in the mirror and sat sideways.
data.literalTranslation: To me she smiled in the mirror and herself sat of side.

data.sentence: Yo estaba idiotizado con el espejo empañado.
data.translation: I was idiotized with the fogged mirror.
data.literalTranslation: I was idiotized with the mirror fogged.

data.sentence: Me dijo: Doble en la esquina, iremos hasta mi casa.
data.translation: She said: Turn on the corner, we'll go to my house.
data.literalTranslation: To me she said: Turn on the corner, we will go to my house.

data.sentence: Después de un par de tequilas, veremos que es lo que pasa.
data.translation: After a couple of tequilas, we'll see what happens.
data.literalTranslation: After of a couple of tequilas, we will see that is what happens.

data.sentence: Para qué describir lo que hicimos en la alfombra.
data.translation: Why describe what we did on the carpet?
data.literalTranslation: To what describe it that we did in the carpet.

data.sentence: Si basta con resumir que le besé hasta la sombra.
data.translation: If it's enough to summarize that I kissed her until the shadow.
data.literalTranslation: If is enough with summarize that to her I kissed until the shadow.

data.sentence: Y un poco más.
data.translation: And a little more.
data.literalTranslation: And a little more.

data.sentence: No se sienta usted tan sola, sufro, aunque no es lo mismo.
data.translation: Don't feel so alone, I suffer, although it is not the same.
data.literalTranslation: No you feel yourself so alone, I suffer, although not is the same.

data.sentence: Mi mujer y mi horario han abierto un abismo.
data.translation: My woman and my schedule have opened an abyss.
data.literalTranslation: My woman and my schedule have opened a abyss.

data.sentence: Cómo se sufre ambos lados de las clases sociales.
data.translation: How one suffers both sides of the social classes.
data.literalTranslation: How one suffers both sides of the classes social.

data.sentence: Usted sufre en su mansión, yo sufro en los arrabales.
data.translation: You suffer in your mansion, I suffer in the outskirts.
data.literalTranslation: You suffer in your mansion, I suffer in the outskirts.

data.sentence: Me dijo: Vente conmigo, que sepa no estoy sola.
data.translation: He said to me: Come with me, that you know I am not alone.
data.literalTranslation: Me said: Come with me, that know not I am alone.

data.sentence: Se hizo en el pelo una cola, fuimos al bar donde estaban.
data.translation: She made a ponytail in her hair, we went to the bar where they were.
data.literalTranslation: She made in the hair a ponytail, we went to the bar where they were.

data.sentence: Entramos precisamente él abrazaba una chica.
data.translation: We entered; precisely, he was hugging a girl.
data.literalTranslation: We entered precisely he was hugging a girl.

data.sentence: Mira si es grande el destino y esta ciudad es chica.
data.translation: Look if destiny is big and this city is small.
data.literalTranslation: Look if is big the destiny and this city is small.

data.sentence: Era mi mujer.
data.translation: It was my woman.
data.literalTranslation: It was my woman.

data.sentence: ¿Qué es lo que hace un taxista cuando un caballero coincide con su mujer en horario y esmero?
data.translation: What does a taxi driver do when a gentleman coincides with his wife in schedule and care?
data.literalTranslation: What is it that does a taxi driver when a gentleman coincides with his woman in schedule and care?

data.sentence: Me pregunté.
data.translation: I wondered.
data.literalTranslation: Myself I asked.

data.sentence: Desde aquella noche, ellos juegan a engañarnos.
data.translation: Since that night, they play at tricking us.
data.literalTranslation: Since that night, they play to trick us.

data.sentence: Se ven en el mismo bar.
data.translation: They see each other in the same bar.
data.literalTranslation: Themselves see in the same bar.

data.sentence: Y la rubia para el taxi, siempre a las diez en el mismo lugar.
data.translation: And the blonde for the taxi, always at ten in the same place.
data.literalTranslation: And the blonde for the taxi, always to the ten in the same place.
